name: "The Lightning Thief" Graphic Novel Online Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: What grade in school was Percy Jackson about to finish in the opening pages of the book?
questions.explanation:
Grade 6.

	Percy had been a bad student. He was one day away from taking the year-end exam for sixth grade. It was mentioned that this was his sixth school in as many years.

questions.text: Which school staff member attacked Percy on the field trip to the museum?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Dodds

	Mrs. Dodds was a pre-algebra teacher and the co-chaperone with Mr. Brunner on the school trip to the museum. Dodds ended up being a monster in disguise and attacked Percy. Mr. Brunner was also a creature in disguise, but he was on Percy's side and helped to slay the beast.

questions.text: Percy's sword is disguised as what everyday item when he's not using it?
questions.explanation:
A pen.

	The pen was first tossed to him by Mr. Brunner, who was actually Chiron in disguise. Chiron was a centaur who is the leader of Camp Half-Blood, where the children of the gods were trained.

questions.text: Percy's best friend Grover wasn't human. He was half goat. What species was he?
questions.explanation:
Satyr.

	Satyrs are also known as the children of Pan. They are most happy when in the woods or near to nature. Grover was sent as a protector for Percy before Percy himself knew he was the son of a god.

questions.text: What creature attacked Percy, his mother and Grover?
questions.explanation:
Minotaur.

	The Minotaur attacked them while they were attempting to reach the safety of Camp Half-Blood. The Minotaur flipped over their car and Percy's mom was trapped. Percy fought off the beast, breaking off one of its horns in the process, but his mother still died.

Poseidon.

	Percy had the power to control water and speak with water-born creatures like his father. Percy found out during his first waking night at Camp Half-Blood who his father was. He was the only child of Poseidon at the camp.

questions.text: Annabeth's mother gave her a hat that made her invisible. What baseball team's logo was on the hat?
questions.explanation:
Yankees.

	Annabeth Chase was the daughter of Athena, goddess of wisdom and battle. Annabeth was the team leader for Percy's first capture the flag game. She sent him to the river, then hid under her hat to try to help out when people attacked him.

questions.text: Who gave Percy a pair of magic flying shoes?
questions.explanation:
Luke.

	Luke, who ended up being the traitor who was working on the side of Hades, gave Percy the shoes. The shoes had been enchanted to pull Percy and Zeus' master bolt down into the underworld.  Percy never wore the shoes though; instead, he gave them to Grover.

questions.text: In what city was the entrance to the underworld concealed?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	Camp Half-Blood was in the state of New York, the underworld entrance was hidden under a recording studio in L.A. In the original novel version the entrance was under the Hollywood sign, not the studio. The studio was called D.O.A. Studios.

Ares.

	Ares, using an unnamed assistant inside Camp Half-Blood stole both Zeus' bolt and Hades helm in an attempt to start a war amongst the gods. Ares wasn't acting on his own accord though, he was being controlled by an unknown source that would be revealed in future books in the series.
